00044 void Bee::DoExtraUpdates(float fTime)
00045 {
00046         if (m_pTarget)
00047         {
00048                 NxVec3 target = m_pTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00049                 m_spAgent->Update(target);
00050                 if (m_pTarget == (GameCharacter*)GameManager::Get()->GetQueen())
00051                 {
00052                         m_spAgent->GetActor()->setGlobalOrientation(m_pTarget->GetAgent()->GetActor()->getGlobalOrientation());
00053                 }
00054                 else
00055                 {
00056                         m_spAgent->LookAt(target);
00057                 }
00058 
00059         }
00060 
00061         //m_spSound->Update(m_spAgent->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition()/50.0f,
00062         //      m_spAgent->GetActor()->getLinearVelocity()/50.0f);
00063 
00064 }

00073 bool Bee::DoExtraInits()
00074 {
00075         if (!GameCharacter::DoExtraInits())
00076         {
00077                 return false;
00078         }
00079 
00080         // add behaviors to a behavior combo
00081         NiTPointerList<BehaviorPtr> lBehavior;
00082         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Arrival());
00083         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Wander());
00084         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Departure());
00085         lBehavior.AddTail(NiNew Separation());
00086         float arrivalC    = 1.0f;
00087         float wanderC     = 0.3f;
00088         float departureC  = 1.0f;
00089         float separationC = 2.0f;
00090 
00091         // add behavior coefficients
00092         NiTPointerList<float> lBehaviorCoef;
00093         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(arrivalC);
00094         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(wanderC);
00095         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(departureC);
00096         lBehaviorCoef.AddTail(separationC);
00097 
00098         // set the bee's behavior
00099         BehaviorComboPtr behavior = NiNew BehaviorCombo(lBehavior, lBehaviorCoef);
00100         m_spAgent->GetController()->SetBehavior((Behavior*)behavior);
00101 
00102         // add the bee to the queen's soldier list
00103         GameManager::Get()->GetQueen()->AddSoldier(this);
00104         // add the bee's agent to the GameManager's agent list
00105         GameManager::Get()->AddAgent(m_spAgent);
00106         // set the default target to the queen
00107         m_pTarget = GameManager::Get()->GetQueen();
00108         // set a small linear damping for the bee's PhysX actor
00109         m_spAgent->GetActor()->setLinearDamping(1.0f);
00110 
00111         //m_spSound = 
00112         //ResourceManager::Get()->GetSound(ResourceManager::RES_SOUND_BEE); 
00113         //m_spSound->Play();
00114 
00115 
00116         return true;
00117 }
